data.description: This document defines the requirements for the second phase of the Browsing Enhancements work item. It addresses the requirements to enhance HTTP-based XHTML and other XML application user agents to meet the current market requirements like converged standards, composite document handling, enhanced security, and easy integration of applications. It will include convergence in XHTML Mobile Profile, WCSS, restructuring of WAEspec for integration usability, and rich dynamic media support (e.g. RME).
